name: part_004
file: tmp_【#天音かなた卒業ライブ】「絶対的アイドル」 ⧸ Amane Kanata Graduation LIVE ＂THE ABSOLUTE IDOL＂【hololive】 [8iGGL_0CEpc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Amane Kanata performs 'Mela!' on stage with a dynamic light show and fire effects.
MC section where Kanata greets the audience, discusses the first song, and her childhood dream of being a hero.
Kanata performs 'Rettou Joutou' (Bring It On) with aggressive choreography and intense laser lighting.

subtitles.original: 信じることが怖い君と
subtitles.english: With you, who's afraid of believing,

subtitles.original: どちらが正しいのかなんて
subtitles.english: as for which of us is right,

subtitles.original: 誰にもわからないさ
subtitles.english: nobody can really know.

subtitles.original: La la la la...
subtitles.english: La la la la...

subtitles.original: 僕らだけの世界
subtitles.english: A world only for us,

subtitles.original: Give and take さ
subtitles.english: it's all give and take.

subtitles.original: 補い合えた暁には
subtitles.english: Once we can complement each other,

subtitles.original: 同じ夢を見たい
subtitles.english: I want us to dream the same dream.

subtitles.original: 君はかっこいいと苦しめて 独りぼっちにさせたのは
subtitles.english: Painfully calling you 'cool' and leaving you all alone,

subtitles.original: 少し僕のせいなんだよな
subtitles.english: that was partly my fault, wasn't it?

subtitles.original: ごめんね
subtitles.english: I'm sorry.

subtitles.original: だけど見るべきはリアルだ
subtitles.english: But reality is what we must face,

subtitles.original: 今こそ僕が助けるんだ
subtitles.english: now it's my turn to save you.

subtitles.original: 抱えないで 信じて頼ってほしいんだ
subtitles.english: Don't hold it all in; I want you to trust and lean on me.

subtitles.original: 今なんじゃない メラメラとたぎる
subtitles.english: Isn't it now? Burning and seething,

subtitles.original: こんな僕にも潜む正義が
subtitles.english: even in me, there's a hidden sense of justice.

subtitles.original: どうしようもない衝動に駆られて
subtitles.english: Driven by an uncontrollable urge,

subtitles.original: ほら気づけば手を握っている
subtitles.english: look, before I know it, I'm holding your hand.

subtitles.original: 放っとけない
subtitles.english: I can't leave you be,

subtitles.original: そんなに荷物を背負い込んでどこへ行くの
subtitles.english: where are you going carrying such a heavy load?

subtitles.original: ほんのちょっと 僕にちょっと預けてみては
subtitles.english: Just a little, why not let me carry some of it?

subtitles.original: こんな僕も君のヒーローになりたいのさ
subtitles.english: Someone like me wants to be your hero, too.

subtitles.original: La la la la...
subtitles.english: La la la la...

subtitles.original: はーい！皆さん！
subtitles.english: Hi, everyone!

subtitles.original: とうとう始まってしまいました！
subtitles.english: It's finally begun!

subtitles.original: 天音かなた卒業ライブということでですね
subtitles.english: This is Amane Kanata's Graduation Live!

subtitles.original: こちら、ハッシュタグがですね
subtitles.english: The hashtag for today...

subtitles.original: あの #天音かなた卒業ライブ でございますんで
subtitles.english: is #AmaneKanataGraduationLive,

subtitles.original: ぜひこちら、よろしくお願いいたします
subtitles.english: so please use it to share your thoughts.

subtitles.original: 1曲目に歌った「今夜のヒンス」は
subtitles.english: The first song, 'Konya no Hince'...

subtitles.original: 実は初配信で歌おうか
subtitles.english: I was actually torn whether to sing it

subtitles.original: 悩んでいた楽曲だったので
subtitles.english: during my very first stream,

subtitles.original: ここで歌えて、すごく良かった
subtitles.english: so I'm really glad I could sing it here.

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: 小さい頃からね、ヒロインよりヒーローに
subtitles.english: Since I was little, I've always wanted to be a hero

subtitles.original: なりたーいっていうタイプだったので
subtitles.english: rather than a heroine,

subtitles.original: そういった楽曲をたくさん歌わせていただきました
subtitles.english: so I've sung many songs with that theme.

subtitles.original: ありがとね、みんな拍手もありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you, and thanks for the applause too!

subtitles.original: 次からは、ロックで感情ぶつけていくような歌を
subtitles.english: Next, I'll be singing rock songs to let my emotions out.

subtitles.original: 調節しますんで... あ、マイクがね
subtitles.english: I'll adjust... Oh, the mic stand...

subtitles.original: 調節しますんで
subtitles.english: I'll adjust it now.

subtitles.original: 聴いてください、「劣等上等」！
subtitles.english: Please listen to 'Bring It On'!

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: 劣等上等
subtitles.english: Bring It On

subtitles.original: ヘイ！ヘイ！ヘイ！ヘイ！
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: 劣等上等 BRING IT ON!
subtitles.english: Inferiority is fine, BRING IT ON!

subtitles.original: ヘイ！ヘイ！ヘイ！ヘイ！
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: 劣等上等 踏み込め
subtitles.english: Inferiority is fine, step forward!

subtitles.original: 子供騙しのマセマティカ
subtitles.english: Child's play mathematics,

subtitles.original: バレてんだってそんなんプライドがない
subtitles.english: I see through it; there's no pride in that.

subtitles.original: 媚びへつらい お飾りで
subtitles.english: Flattery and mere decorations,

subtitles.original: 髪の毛一本ばかりじゃつまんねー
subtitles.english: just a single hair is so boring.

subtitles.original: ほらもっと 間違って上等
subtitles.english: Look, more mistakes are just fine,

subtitles.original: 退屈に手をかけて
subtitles.english: give boredom a piece of your mind.

subtitles.original: ママ、やっぱ私は
subtitles.english: Mama, after all, I...

subtitles.original: こんなところじゃ終われない
subtitles.english: can't let it end in a place like this.

subtitles.original: ぬるい敵が震えそう
subtitles.english: Weak enemies seem ready to tremble,

subtitles.original: ごっこ遊びも芝居もさよなら
subtitles.english: goodbye to playing house and acting.

subtitles.original: ずっとこのままなんてさ
subtitles.english: Staying like this forever is...

subtitles.original: いらないよ
subtitles.english: unnecessary.

subtitles.original: だっだっだ あたし大人になる
subtitles.english: Da-da-da, I'm becoming an adult,

subtitles.original: 酸いも甘いも噛み分けて
subtitles.english: experiencing both the sour and the sweet.

subtitles.original: ぱっぱっぱ 変わる時代
subtitles.english: Pa-pa-pa, in this changing era,

subtitles.original: 悪いことばかりじゃないでしょう
subtitles.english: it's not all bad things, is it?

subtitles.original: 過去も今もすべてを 繋げて歩いていきたいや
subtitles.english: Connecting past and present, I want to keep walking.

subtitles.original: 超えろはー
subtitles.english: Surpass it all—

subtitles.original: ほら 挑発 私達は脳濁
subtitles.english: Look, a provocation, our brains are foggy,

subtitles.original: 緑のアイツにバカかまって
subtitles.english: wasting time on that green guy.

subtitles.original: さあ どーなっつ いつまでもどうか
subtitles.english: Now, donuts, forever and somehow,

subtitles.original: 仰いでよ どこが残念なんですか？
subtitles.english: look up, what exactly is so unfortunate?
